page.title: 09A day in the life of Louise
page.content: My name is Louise Hankins.In the morning my mum comes upstairs and wakes me at 7.55 a.m.I usually lay in bed until 8.00.My mum puts breakfast on the table.I have toast and jam.Lisa calls for me and we go to the shops for sweets and then to school.In the classroom Mr Roberts does the register we then have maths until break at 10.40.At 11.00 we come in and do some finishing off until 11.50 then we go to dinner.At 1.15 we do art until 2.00 then we get changed for p.e.After that we have language or topic for an hour then we have a story until home time.I walk home with Lisa and Angela and stay at my auntie Dots until my mum comes back from work.At 5.00 we have tea ,nearly always a pizza.Then i go round to my sisters, she lives with her boyfriend called Porkie, and watch television until bedtime.
